The metric chosen in the study on monitoring coal spontaneous combustion at the low-temperature oxidation stage using terahertz dielectric property measurement system and machine learning algorithms is the terahertz dielectric constant spectrum. This metric, combined with machine learning algorithms, proved to be a promising technique for monitoring coal spontaneous combustion with high efficiency.
